main.name: Akash Kumar
main.description: I am a self-driven individual with the ability to adapt to any situation and proven potential to grow self and others
main.bio:
I am a Software Engineer. I have good command in Java, Python, and C/C++. I have used the SQLite database, Oops concepts, and file handling in my projects.
 I had built a basic mathematical mobile calculator using Java and XML. I have made a project named "CGPA calculator" where Python Tkinter library was used to build the UI and the SQLite database was used and CRUD operations of RDMS were used.
 I also have basic knowledge of HTML, JavaScript and CSS. Using these I have also made a website as a part of academic assignment. I have also undergone two certifications on Python language provided by Google and Internshala and one in android development from Internshala.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch with me. I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be a part of your visions.

education.degree: PCM with Computer Science and Physical education
